title: 10/01/21 DPS Hour 3 Seth Wickersham
itunes:title: 10/01/21 DPS Hour 3 Seth Wickersham
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan dissects the ugliness unfolding between estranged guard/forward Ben Simmons and the Philadelphia 76ers--and why Simmons is the selfish party in the standoff. Also, author and senior writer at ESPN, Seth Wickersham, stops in to discuss his new book about the New England Patriots' dynasty.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
